Method Detail

runProcess

public static java.lang.String runProcess(java.lang.ProcessBuilder processBuilder)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Runs the given process, taking care of the necessary streams from the process.

Parameters:
processBuilder - ProcessBuilder containing the process to be run
Returns:
string containing the std and error output from the process
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception occurs
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the process is interrupted
